page.title: 05ECOLOGY
page.content: Though much of the area is built up (residential and industrial)there is a surprising amount of natural history; 72 types of{birds}have been seen. Recently nuthatches have nested in Worden Park.Other birds include owls kingfisher,sparrowhawk,collared dove redshank,greater spotted woodpecker and siskins.{Mammals}include fox,mice, rabbit water vole,skews,woodmice and rats.In Worden Park grey squirrels have taken over from the red squirrel. Insects are abundant with dragonflies beetles ladybirds, craneflies and 14 kinds of butterflies.Established{trees include oak,ash,willow,sycamore,elm (despite disease),horse chestnut, beech and poplar.Just recently a variety of young trees have been planted.{Wildflowers}are plentiful and vary from daises to rare northern marsh orchids.
